Articles.Content: I am using the docking port junior for my orbital refuelling station but when docked I can not get it to perform a fuel transfer. The cross feed is enabled on both ports and I have fuel in the tank. I think I am using version 1.1.2 is there something I am doing wrong? Please help.

Are you playing Career mode?

If so you need to upgrade your R&D center before fuel transfer is enabled.

If you have it unlocked but are just unsure of how to actually do it you have to Alt+Right Click on the fuel tanks to open up the cross feed menu/buttons.

You may have done what I stupidly did.... if you rotate the clamp, then you wont be able to dock with it.... assuming of course you didn't put it in upside down.

Just attach it as it comes and you may find it works again.

 

EDIT, sorry, read what you actually said... disregard all I said.

Edited June 30, 2016 by kiwi1960
